name: MIT Stellar - Simple Theme
description: Removed a lot of the clutter from the MIT Stellar (classes) webpage. This will only affect the stellar.mit.edu subdomains. Functionality is not reduced, text is legible, unnecessary images and decorations are removed, and the background is now white.
additional_info:
Release 1.0
--
This came from a CSS override that I've been storing in my cache. Unfortunately, these overrides would be reset intermittently. I found userstyles and simply migrated my code to here so that changes would be permanent. I'm not a CSS expert, so the code is definitely not tight.

If you have any suggestions, feel free to contact me by visiting www.anran.li/contact
